flawed_nl_solution:
In one week there will be 50+20=<<50+20=100>>100 seashells
In two weeks there will be 100+20=<<100+20=120>>120 seashells
In three weeks there will be 120+20=<<120+20=140>>140 seashells
In four weeks there will be 140+20=<<140+20=160>>160 seashells
#### 160

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 70, not 100. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
